title: MC_GroupReadConfiguration (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_GroupReadConfiguration
This function block gets the axis reference according to the given
group identifier in order to read the current configuration
of an axis group.
This is an administrative FB, since no movement is generated.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Gets the axis reference according to the given group identifier
while enabled

rows: Identifies the axis in the group
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
